ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Player wipe on Test
ygData.msgSnippet: ok who s got japanese text loaded?  Outlook is demanding I load plugins everytime I read this string ... From: Perhaps a Princess...  To:
ygData.messageBody:
ok who's got japanese text loaded? Outlook is demanding I load plugins
everytime I read this string
----- Original Message -----
From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 21, 2000 11:25 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Player wipe on Test


> Verant is capable of creating high level character.
>
> Guildmates of mine were in the Kunark beta (several of them.
> Enough to notice they were gone off of the production server)
> Verant would buff them up to a required level, and then take them
> to fight specific things. It wasn't all just random go anywhere,
> do anything type stuff. At the end, they got buffed up to 60 to
> do some of the highest stuff -- and there are pictures of some of that
> that was out before Kunark actually came out.
>
> I am sure they are capable of buffing up the people on Test actually
> doing TESTING for them to levels necessary to test the things that
> need testing.
>
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
> >Sent: Wednesday, June 21, 2000 7:18 AM
>
> > My concern is this: How long will it take players of the less-common
> >classes (in particular Bards and Rogues) get to higher levels to test the
> >songs/skills etc that only come at the high-level.
>
> > I heard (here?) that Verant's in-house testing group is
> >four.
>
> Yes. Here. And I'd put the status of that at the state of rumor.
>
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
